code: @Before public void setUpAction() {     new RestTermVectorsAction(Settings.EMPTY, controller()). }

public void testTypeInPath() {     RestRequest request = new FakeRestRequest.Builder(xContentRegistry()).withMethod(Method.POST).withPath("/some_index/some_type/some_id/_termvectors").build().     dispatchRequest(request).     assertWarnings(RestTermVectorsAction.TYPES_DEPRECATION_MESSAGE). }

public void testTypeInBody() throws IOException {     XContentBuilder content = XContentFactory.jsonBuilder().startObject().field("_type", "some_type").field("_id", 1).endObject().     RestRequest request = new FakeRestRequest.Builder(xContentRegistry()).withMethod(Method.GET).withPath("/some_index/_termvectors/some_id").withContent(BytesReference.bytes(content), XContentType.JSON).build().     dispatchRequest(request).     assertWarnings(RestTermVectorsAction.TYPES_DEPRECATION_MESSAGE). }
